body: Ok, so im in minecraft and i accidently hit Super Secret Settings.. Now, it wont go away. Its on a weird 3d thing. I press f to turn it back to normal, and in f3 it says its normal even though there is still 3d. I need help now.
body_tagged: Ok, so im in minecraft and i accidently hit Super Secret Settings.. Now, it wont go away. Its on a weird 3d thing. I press f to turn it back to normal, and in f3 it says its normal even though there is still 3d. I need help now.
title: Help ASAP {RESOLVED}

replies.body: keep on clicking super secret settings until you get back to the default settings
replies.body_tagged: keep on clicking super secret settings until you get back to the default settings

replies.body: I guess you keep on changing the super secret settings over and over again until it is back to normal? (this is just a guess)
replies.body_tagged: I guess you keep on changing the super secret settings over and over again until it is back to normal? (this is just a guess)

replies.body: Keep clicking on it until it goes back to normal.
replies.body_tagged: Keep clicking on it until it goes back to normal.

replies.body: I did. What im saying is, it says it IS normal, but it is still all 3d
replies.body_tagged: I did. What im saying is, it says it IS normal, but it is still all 3d

replies.body:
Ok, so now the 3d is gone. But my skin is black and white and the colored names are darker...

Screenie

replies.body: Try going through the settings again.
replies.body_tagged: Try going through the settings again.

replies.body: The only reason colors wouldn't work for names would be the multiplayer setting "Colors" which I doubt due to your skin being black and white as well.
replies.body_tagged: The only reason colors wouldn't work for names would be the multiplayer setting "Colors" which I doubt due to your skin being black and white as well.

replies.body:
If you read the OP, you would know that I did press f4 around 7 times.

Anyways, the problem has been resolved. I switched to 1.5 then switched to 1.7 and it worked. Thanks for the help guys, feel free to lock.
replies.body_tagged:
If you read the OP, you would know that I did press f4 around 7 times.

Anyways, the problem has been resolved. I switched to 1.5 then switched to 1.7 and it worked. Thanks for the help guys, feel free to lock.

replies.body:
IF it is split like it would work with 3D glasses (red and blue) then it is not Super Secret Settings. To turn it off your would go into video settings and set 3D Analygraph to off.

Edit: didn't see it was resolved xP
replies.body_tagged:
IF it is split like it would work with 3D glasses (red and blue) then it is not Super Secret Settings. To turn it off your would go into video settings and set 3D Analygraph to off.

Edit: didn't see it was resolved xP

replies.body: Re install Minecraft. Easy solution. Don't know why you didn't do that...
